content: {A沉醉闻}What's this stuck on the talisman...? It smells and looks like some kinda seed, but I've never seen any like it, curious...

content: {A惊讶}A fish? <style=SizeBig>That's the one~!</style> O' Skies Above, how did you know it was that one? That's amazin'!

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I'm so sorry! I... I still haven't caught that big grass carp...

content: If Gran'mama finds out, she's gonna nag me for sure. "Can't even watch over your own stuff, and still wanna live independently?" Then she'll get worked up over nothin' again... Yeee~?!

content: If I clean it up and let it dry, Gran'mama won't even notice...{短暂停} {A心虚目移}Y-You'll keep it a secret, right mah? Don't go tellin' on me, okay~?

content: Did it come from the grass carp's mouth? What if, what if it's some kinda special crop mah?! I really wanna try plantin' it. This must be...

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you! You always remember what I've said and step up to help without a word. Then I... I'll take it loh...
